A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The more I think about this movie the more I dislike it. So many holes in the plot it’s surprising this was the final version. Here’s a few: 1. Apparently all space ships have the same maximum speed as the first order just couldn’t catch up to the resistance. What?! This was the entire plot line of the movie basically. How did nobody involved question this? 2. When did droids become pets? So the resistance loses half their personnel but Poe is so excited to see bb8 that he gets down and fondles him? He does know it’s just a robot\, right? 3. How can Rey become an expert swordsman with absolutely no training? Stupid. 4. The liberal social commentary that was forced down the audiences throat during the casino scene was awful. 5. If you can destroy big first order ships by jumping to light speed\, why not just have a droid pilot an x-wing through one every time? Even if you see them as pets\, Laura D would still be alive. That’s just a few. Overall\, pretty disappointing. I honestly feel like a high schooler could have written a better script.
